title: About
text:
About me
Hi! I’m Jasmine, the developer of lyriguessr. I study Statistics & Data Science and Computer Science at UT Austin, and love working on projects such as lyriguessr in my free time.

Business inquiries: contact me at lyriguessr@gmail.com!

The idea of lyriguessr all started with tayLyrics, the Taylor Swift-themed game I initially created for myself and my roommate Hannah during my freshman year. We’re both Swifties and are avid tayLyrics players - try to beat us on the leaderboard!
I realized that tayLyrics could be generalized to any artist - why not share the fun with everyone, right? And so lyriguessr was born.

My favorite artists are Waterparks, Bad Omens, and Taylor Swift. Follow me on Spotify here!



Acknowledgements
A couple people I’d like to thank for their contributions to lyriguessr’s development…

My roommate (and the love of my life) Hannah, whose love for (and insane competency at) tayLyrics inspired the creation of lyriguessr
Jiant, for his business insights
Trus, for designing the amazing lyriguessr logo

title: Olivia Rodrigo
text:
Play the game!




Go to oliviaRodriguessr! (opens external link)




Details






Announcement



I am taking requests for cooler/punnier names for this game! Tweet me your ideas on Twitter @lyriguessr and I will run a poll!


Lyrics range from SOUR to GUTS (spilled).

There are 1,219 lines in the dataset, with 920 of them being unique lines.

title: Dataset Details
text:
Dataset Details
Generally, artist datasets comprise of all songs from studio albums - excluding EPs and singles. But there are exceptions! All lyrics and section designators (chorus, verses, etc.) are taken from Genius (so blame them for unusual lyric cutoffs!).


Dataset Statistics
Naturally, the larger the artist dataset, the harder the game is! If you like stats, this table is for you.

title: Welcome to lyriguessr!
text:
⚔️ The Game
Earn as many points as possible by guessing the song that the generated lyric(s) comes from.
If you don’t have a guess, you can ask for up to 3 hints per round. You start with 20 hints per game, but you can earn one extra hint every 10 rounds! Or, you can choose to give up.






Points Breakdown (click to expand)






Easy correct guess: +1
Medium correct guess: +3
Hard correct guess: +5
Hint (each): -1
Giving up: -2






🎵 Artists

Interact with me at @lyriguessr on Twitter or Instagram to request new artists!
